name: Ustream Coin
description: Ustream, once a trailblazer in live streaming technology, has the potential for an innovative resurgence in the Web3 era, particularly on the Solana blockchain. By integrating blockchain technology into its foundational principles, Ustream can redefine the future of live streaming with decentralization, transparency, and creator empowerment. Before the social media giants popularized live streaming, Ustream set the stage for real-time online broadcasting.
